data.name: Title
data.value: Privacy Policy

data.name: PoliticaDePrivacidad
data.value: Privacy Policy

data.name: PrivacidadImportante
data.value: Your privacy is important to us. At GestaCentro, we are committed to protecting your personal data and complying with all applicable privacy and data protection regulations.

data.name: DescribeComo
data.value: This privacy policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

data.name: InformacionQueRecopilamos
data.value: Information We Collect

data.name: RecopilamosVariosTipos
data.value: We collect various types of information in connection with the services we offer, including:

data.name: InformacionIdentificacionPersonal
data.value: Personal Identification Information: name, email address, phone number, and address.

data.name: InformacionDeUso
data.value: Usage Information: details about how and when you use our services.

data.name: InformacionTecnica
data.value: Technical Information: IP address, browser type, operating system, and other technical data.

data.name: ComoUtilizamosInformacion
data.value: How We Use Your Information

data.name: UtilizamosInformacionRecopilada
data.value: We use the information we collect for various purposes, including:

data.name: ProveerOperarMantener
data.value: Provide, operate, and maintain our services.

data.name: MejorarPersonalizarExpandir
data.value: Improve, personalize, and expand our services.

data.name: EntenderAnalizar
data.value: Understand and analyze how you use our services.

data.name: DesarrollarNuevasFuncionalidades
data.value: Develop new functionalities, products, and services.

data.name: ComunicarnosContigo
data.value: Communicate with you, either directly or through one of our partners, including customer service, to provide you with updates and other information relating to the service, and for promotional and marketing purposes.

data.name: ProcesarTransaccionesPedidos
data.value: Process your transactions and manage your orders.

data.name: DetectarPrevenirFraudes
data.value: Detect and prevent fraud and technical issues.

data.name: ComoProtegemosInformacion
data.value: How We Protect Your Information

data.name: ImplementamosMedidasSeguridad
data.value: We implement various security measures to ensure the protection of your personal data, including:

data.name: UsoTecnologiasCifrado
data.value: Use of encryption technologies to protect data during transmission.

data.name: AlmacenamientoDatosSeguros
data.value: Storage of data on secure servers.

data.name: RestriccionAcceso
data.value: Restriction of access to personal data to authorized employees only.

data.name: CompartirInformacion
data.value: Sharing Your Information

data.name: NoVendemosInformacion
data.value: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personally identifiable information to outside parties unless we provide you with advance notice. This does not include our website hosting partners and other parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or servicing you, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential.

data.name: TusDerechos
data.value: Your Rights

data.name: TienesDerechoA
data.value: You have the right to:

data.name: AccederDatosPersonales
data.value: Access your personal data and request a copy of it.

data.name: SolicitarCorreccion
data.value: Request the correction of incorrect or incomplete personal data.

data.name: SolicitarEliminacion
data.value: Request the deletion of your personal data.

data.name: RestringirProcesamiento
data.value: Restrict the processing of your personal data.

data.name: OponerteProcesamiento
data.value: Object to the processing of your personal data.

data.name: SolicitarPortabilidad
data.value: Request the portability of your personal data.

data.name: EjercerDerechos
data.value: To exercise these rights, please contact us at privacidad@proyectofinaldam2324.site.

data.name: CambiosPoliticaPrivacidad
data.value: Changes to This Privacy Policy

data.name: ReservamosDerecho
data.value: We reserve the right to update this privacy policy at any time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new privacy policy on this page. We recommend that you review this policy periodically to stay informed of any updates.

data.name: Contacto
data.value: Contact

data.name: PreguntasPoliticaPrivacidad
data.value: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at privacidad@proyectofinaldam2324.site.
